Author: michellenemangepas
Text: 1. Decide how many calories you wanna have today. 2. Decide how many of those are gonna be alcohol. (Eg. 5 shots of vodka is like 65cals Ã—5 so 325cals) 3. The rest is food. Plan on what you'll want to eat to soak up that alcohol. 4. Drink a bit on an empty stomqch, get tipsy, ride the wave. 5. First food in. 6. Drink some more. Get fucked. But not shitty-feeling-fucked. 7. Eat the rest on the planned food, have lots of water and then bed. And like drink water through the whole thing.
